channel.title: Make portal's work!
channel.description:
Hey guys, could i have some help please, I want to make a portal from varrock bank to duel arena and from duel arena to varrock bank
But everytime i try it i either get error or it dont work, im useing phonescape source so can anyone take me through a little tut and tell me how to make it work, i've tried zammyking111's tut but i just get error so...
CAN YOU HELP ME GETTING IT TO WORK ON PHONESCAPE!!!!
thx's she bitch-

item.title: Make portal's work!

item.title: Make portal's work!
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

try this

case 2469:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
teleportToX = (3341);
teleportToY = (3246);
sendMessage("Welcome to the Shops");
}
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Make portal's work!

item.description:

Erm no it dont work, i did this

case 2469: teleportToX = (3341); teleportToY = (3246); sendMessage("Welcome to the Shops"); break;

When i click portal, nothing happends…

item.title: Make portal's work!
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

case (portal Item ID # Here): teleportToX = (coords X); teleportToY = (coords Y); sendMessage("Welcome to the Duel Arena!"); break;

Read full topic
